headline: FOXBORO MIRAN 1BX
description: Portable Ambient Air Analyzer    Ideal for Air Monitoring in the Workplace Environment
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Foxboro
Model Miran1BX
Description Analyzer, Portable, Ambient Air
Accessories 9-pin computer cable and nylon shoulder strap included
Battery charger included
Other Information
  • Single-beam infrared spectrometer uses microprocessor to automatically
    control the analysis, average the measurement signal, and calculate absorbance
  • Pre-programmed to measure over 100 different gasses (also user-programmable)
  • Absorbance: 0.00 to 2.00 AU
  • Computer Communication Port: 9-pin female serial interface
  • Digital Readout of concentration (ppm) and absorbance (AU)
  • Wavelength: 2.5 to 14.1 micrometers; repeatable to +/- 0.1%
  • Measurement Cycle Time: 1 minute/sample
  • Internal, rechargeable, nickel-cadmium battery allows up to 4 hours
    of continuous operation (recharge time after total discharge = 14-16 hours)
Power Requirements 120 V 50/60 Hz
Year of Manufacture 1988
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.000 in (20.3 cm)
Depth 26.000 in (66.0 cm)
Height 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Weight 40 lb (18 kg)
